title: Come Tex nessuno mai (2012)
storyline: 'Come Tex nessuno mai' a portrait of Sergio Bonelli, helmsman of the dreams of an Italy that found between fantasy and adventure the pages of his comics. The documentary with multiple entries (Bernardo Bertolucci, Milo Manara, etc.) demonstrating how their creative imagination was influenced by comic book heroes. Every generation has before him 'a world unknown, who would like to know and often comic book heroes help them to start this journey. The documentary tells how Sergio Bonelli was the custodian of a right / duty: LIVING THE ADVENTURE.
